name: limeade
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
mainly US a drink made with water, sugar, and the juice of limes (= small fruits like round, green lemons) : You can combine lime juice with water and sugar to make limeade. They sell freshly squeezed limeade.
UK (US lime soda) a sweet, fizzy (= with bubbles) drink that tastes like lime: a can of limeade She asked for a limeade.
More examplesFewer examplesThe limes were squeezed to make the concentrate for homemade limeade.You can freeze the concentrate, store it in the refrigerator, or use it to make limeade right away.I drank some of my limeade.She had a green salad and limeade.
